title:
Commutativity and spectral properties for a general class of
  Szasz-Mirakjan-Durrmeyer operators
authors: Ulrich Abel, Ana Maria Acu, Margareta Heilmann, Ioan Rasa
abstract:
In this paper we present commutativity results for a general class of
Szasz-Mirakjan-Durrmeyer type operators and associated differential operators
and investigate their eigenfunctions.
